title: Arcane Rush
description: The first time you take Wound Hit point Damage each combat, you automatically regain 30-40 Attunement Points.

title: Cleave
description: Killing an opponent using a Heavy Melee Weapon restores 1 Attack.

title: Crippling Finesse
description: When scoring a Backstab hit using a Light Weapon, the targets gets a random injury Condition.

title: Decapitation
description: The gruesomeness of your Axe-Kill causes the Fear condition in all opponents who can see it.

title: Deep Cut
description: Your Critical Hits using Blades cause Bleeding on your target.

title: Inspiring Kill
description: When killing an Opponent in Armed or Unarmed Melee combat, all Allies who witness the kill get the Inspired Condition for 1 Turn.

title: Kneecap
description: Critical Hits with a Club causes The Injured Leg condition.

title: Magnificent Takedown
description: When killing a Marked target, all Allies who witness the kill get the Inspired Condition for 1 Turn.

title: Not Today!
description: The first time you take Wound Hit point Damage each combat, you automatically regain 12-18 Vitality Hit Points.

title: Rapid Reload
description: If you score a Critical Hit with a Bow, you immediately regain 1 attack.

title: Red Arcs
description: Scoring a Critical Hit with a Light Blade causes you to restore 1 Attack.

title: Rending Blow
description: Critical Hits with an Axe causes Injury Conditions.

title: Replenishing Takedown
description: Killing a Marked Target, heals the party a small amount.

title: Shield Slam
description: Whilst wielding a shield, dodging a melee attack causes you to deal 1-4 Blunt damage to your attacker.

title: Smashing Charge
description: Your Charges cause 1-3 additional Blunt Damage.

title: Smoke Bomb
description: The first time you're Wounded each combat, you automatically hide.

title: Weakly Infections
description: Your unarmed attack may cause disease in the target.

title: Weaving Blade
description: Dodging a Melee Attack whilst armed causes you to deal a small amont of Slashing Damage to your attacker.
